name: add_building_america_benchmark_occupants

arguments.name: space_type
arguments.display_name: Select the space where the occupants is located

modeler_description: Adds or replaces "People" objects to the building in the user specified zone.
description: This measure adds occupants to the home. The number of occupants depends on the number of bedrooms in the home. The schedule used by the occupants comes from the BUilding America House Simulation Protocols (http://energy.gov/sites/prod/files/2014/03/f13/house_simulation_protocols_2014.pdf). Users must also select which space is the living space (where occupants spend the majority of their time).
